about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building tools to help developers succeed
about.description: Passionate about creating intuitive and powerful applications that solve real-world problems. This AI Resume Builder is designed to streamline the job application process for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower job seekers with AI-driven tools that make creating professional resumes effortless and effective.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every professional can present their best self to potential employers without the stress of formatting and writing.

dashboard.title: My Resumes
dashboard.empty: No resumes yet. Create your first one!

home.title: Build Your Customer Resume
home.subtitle: Effortlessly create a standout resume with our advanced AI-powered Resume Builder. Optimize your job chances today.

hero.title: Build Your Resume

createResume.title: AI Resume Creator
createResume.description: AI automatically writes and optimizes your resume content based on experience and skills, ensuring professionalism and appeal.

mockInterview.title: AI Mock Interview
mockInterview.description: Practice interview answers with smart AI Bot. Get detailed feedback on content, tone, and body language.

findJobs.title: Find Jobs
findJobs.description: System automatically connects your profile with thousands of suitable employers, helping you find your dream job faster.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied professionals who landed their dream jobs

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.quote: This builder helped me land a job at a top tech company. The AI suggestions were spot on!

testimonial2.name: David Chen
testimonial2.quote: The interview prep feature gave me the confidence I needed to ace my interviews.

testimonial3.name: Emily Davis
testimonial3.quote: Simple, intuitive, and effective. Highly recommended for anyone job hunting.

cta.title: Ready for Your Dream Job?
cta.subtitle: Start building your professional resume today, completely free. No credit card required.
